results.name: Binary array, related to the Thue-Morse sequence A010060, read by downward antidiagonals.
link: David Applegate, Benoit Cloitre, Philippe Deléham and N. J. A. Sloane, Sloping binary numbers: a new sequence related to the binary numbers [pdf, ps].
example: .The k-th row, for k>=1, has alternating blocks of length 2^k, consisting of the initial 2^k terms of A010060:
Columns written in base 10 (see Table 2 of reference) give 0, -1, -2, 1, -4, 3, 2, -3, -8, 7, 6, -7, 4, -5, -6, 5, .... (see A104895).
results.author: _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 24 2005
